title: Watching old gameplay
body: I remember an old game play of my friends and was wondering if there is a way I can find it to watch. Any websites that allow older game play spectating?

replies.body: Our replay system works in a way that you can only watch replays from the same patch that you're currently on. If you didn't ever save the replay as a highlight, you may not be able to watch it anymore. I'm not personally aware of any websites that are able to save all your replays from older patches.
